link_desc:
Monitoring of Docker containers (LXC/systemd Docker supported) - Zabbix template and Zabbix C module. Available CPU, mem, blkio container metrics and some containers config details e.g. IP, name, ... Zabbix Docker module has native support for Docker containers (Systemd included) and should support also a few other container type (e.g. LXC) out of the box.

Available as a Docker image as well

docker run \
  --name=zabbix-agent-xxl \
  -h `hostname` \
  -p 10050:10050 \
  -v /:/rootfs \
  -e "ZA_Server=" \
  -d monitoringartist/zabbix-agent-xxl-limited:latest

Visit Zabbix agent 3.0 XXL with Docker monitoring support for more informations.
features: Low Level Discovery (LLD)|Zabbix Agent|Zabbix Agent Active
